faceErrorMes: - This ID Document don't  contains  face, please use  valid  ID document
mrzErrorMes: - This  ID document don't  contains  valid  MRZ, please  use valid ID document  and retake

Home.title: VERIFY YOUR IDENTITY
Home.titleDes: it will take a fews seconds
Home.checkDes1: Prepare a valid Goverment-issued ID Documemt(Passport, ID Card, Resident Permit).
Home.checkDes2: Be ready to capture your selfie and photos of your ID document.
Home.checkDes3: Be sure you are in well-lit room.

PhotoLivness.title: Selfie Capture
PhotoLivness.message: Please place your face correctly inside the oval frame and take a capture

documentCountry.title: ID Document Country
documentCountry.message: Please select the Goverment ID Document issuing country

livenessResult.title: Face Liveness Result
livenessResult.unableMesDes: Image is too blurry or contain glares!

idMain.title: ID Document Type
idMain.message: Please select your ID Document type

idDocumentCamera.frontIDMes: Place the front of National ID Card inside the frame and take the photo
idDocumentCamera.backIDMes: Place the back page of National ID Card inside the frame and take the photo
idDocumentCamera.passportMes: Place the Passport inside the frame amd take the photo
idDocumentCamera.frontResidentMes: Place the front of Residence Permit Card inside the frame and take the photo
idDocumentCamera.backResidentMes: Place the back of Residence Permit Card inside the frame and take the photo
idDocumentCamera.previewMes: Make sure  the  document  is clear  to read

poaDoc.title: POA Document
poaDoc.message: Please select the type of document and enter the proof of address document issuing date.

poaDocumentCamera.title: Scan PoA Document
poaDocumentCamera.message: Place the  Proof of address  document  inside of frame  and capture  the document
poaDocumentCamera.previewMessage: Make sure  the  document  is clear  to read

idDocResult.title: Result
idDocResult.message: Your identity verification process is completed successfully
